sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnbkmkmenumanageresult ( menu_id , emplyr_id , menu_nm , progrm_stre_path ) VALUES ( #menuId# , #emplyrId# , #menuNm# , #progrmStrePath# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnbkmkmenumanageresult SET menu_id = #menuId# , emplyr_id = #emplyrId# , menu_nm = #menuNm# , progrm_stre_path = #progrmStrePath# WHERE 1 = 1 AND menu_id = #menuId# AND emplyr_id = #emplyrId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnbkmkmenumanageresult WHERE 1 = 1 AND menu_id = #menuId# AND emplyr_id = #emplyrId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT menu_id , emplyr_id , menu_nm , progrm_stre_path FROM COMTNBKMKMENUMANAGERESULT WHERE menu_id = #menuId# AND emplyr_id = #emplyrId#

SELECT A.MENU_ID , A.EMPLYR_ID , A.MENU_NM , A.PROGRM_STRE_PATH FROM ( SELECT MENU_ID , EMPLYR_ID , MENU_NM , PROGRM_STRE_PATH , ROWNUM FROM COMTNBKMKMENUMANAGERESULT WHERE 1=1
MENU_ID = #searchKeyword#
EMPLYR_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY MENU_ID DESC , EMPLYR_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNBKMKMENUMANAGERESULT WHERE 1=1
MENU_ID = #searchKeyword#
EMPLYR_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
